description:
My place is close to Bed-Vyne Brew, Eugene & Company, Bed-Stuy Fish Fry, Locanda Vini & Olii, and L'Antagonist 
Peaches Hot House
Peaches 
Beso
Wine Threapy Bar . You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the light, and , the comfy bed, the local bars and restaurants . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Central location for public transportation. A 7 min walk to the nearest subway
name: Lovely Bedstuy apt
